robocode

Interface Droid


  • public interface Droid
    Robots that implement Droid have no scanner, but an extra 20 life/energy. This class is intended for use in teams.
    Author:
    Mathew A. Nelson (original)
    See Also:
    JuniorRobot, Robot, AdvancedRobot, TeamRobot, RateControlRobot, BorderSentry
